it.polimi.se2019.view.client.cli

Class CLI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.se2019.view.View
        • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.RemoteView
          • it.polimi.se2019.view.client.cli.CLI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer

    public class CLI
extends RemoteView
    Class that manages the interaction with the controller through a CLI view
